channel.title: 562 Help
channel.description:
Was wandering how I would go about loading NPC spawns through the .cfg file and not the .xml file.
I simply changed [code]List<NPC> spawns = (List<NPC>) XStreamUtil.getXStream().fromXML(new FileInputStream("data/npcs.xml"));[/code]
To
[code]List<NPC> spawns = (List<NPC>) XStreamUtil.getXStream().fromXML(new FileInputStream("data/npcs/npcspawn.cfg"));[/code]
Compiled, no errors go to login and get all kinds of errors.
Help?
